snippet: A battle is raging over the restoration Leonardo da Vinci’s “Virgin and Child With Saint Anne,” pitting the Louvre against those who believe that the cleaning has been too aggressive.
abstract: Art experts are bitterly divided over the Louvre's restoration of Leonardo da Vinci's painting Virgin and Child With Saint Anne; some feel the cleaning has been too aggressive and may already have caused irreversible damage.
lead_paragraph: A battle is raging over the restoration Leonardo da Vinci’s “Virgin and Child With Saint Anne,” pitting the Louvre against those who believe that the cleaning has been too aggressive.

headline.seo: Clash Over Restoration of Leonardo’s ‘Virgin and Child’
